summary.span: 获取声明的颁发者。

span.span: Gets the issuer of the claim.

value.span: 一个名称，指声明的颁发者。

span.span: A name that refers to the issuer of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值 是从颁发者名称注册表所维护的众所周知颁发者列表中获取的名称。The value of the property is a name that is taken from a list of well-known issuers maintained by the issuer name registry. 颁发者名称注册表是从类派生的类的实例 。The issuer name registry is an instance of a class that derives from the class. 颁发者名称注册表将助记键名称与验证颁发者生成的令牌签名所需的加密材料) (颁发者名称关联起来。例如，x.509 证书。The issuer name registry associates a mnemonic name (the issuer name) with the cryptographic material that is needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the issuer; for example, an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: public string OriginalIssuer { get; }
.property instance string OriginalIssuer
Public ReadOnly Property OriginalIssuer As String
public: property System::String ^ OriginalIssuer { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.OriginalIssuer : string

summary.span: 获取声明的最初颁发者。

span.span: Gets the original issuer of the claim.

value.span: 引用声明原始颁发者的名称。

span.span: A name that refers to the original issuer of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含最初发出声明的实体的名称。Contains the name of the entity that originally issued the claim. 此属性旨在促进以下方案：在客户端向 RP 应用程序提供声明之前，声明可通过多个颁发者。例如，联合方案。This property is designed to facilitate scenarios where a claim may pass through multiple issuers before it is presented by the client to the RP application; such as federation scenarios. 属性的值 是从颁发者名称注册表所维护的众所周知颁发者列表中获取的名称。The value of the property is a name that is taken from a list of well-known issuers maintained by the issuer name registry. 颁发者名称注册表是从类派生的类的实例 。The issuer name registry is an instance of a class that derives from the class. 颁发者名称注册表将助记键名称与验证颁发者生成的令牌签名所需的加密材料) (颁发者名称关联起来。例如，x.509 证书。The issuer name registry associates a mnemonic name (the issuer name) with the cryptographic material that is needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the issuer; for example, an X.509 certificate. 除了委托和联合方案， 属性和 属性通常具有相同的值。Except for delegation and federation scenarios, the property and the property will usually have the same value. 如果属性的值 与属性的值不同 ，则声明是最初由原始颁发者颁发的，随后由颁发者重新颁发。If the value of the property differs from the value of the property, the claim was first issued by the original issuer and was subsequently re-issued by the issuer.

summary.span: 获取包含与此声明关联的附加属性的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains additional properties associated with this claim.

value.span: 包含与声明关联的附加属性的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains additional properties associated with the claim.

value.span: 作为名称-值对表示的属性。

span.span: The properties are represented as name-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供一个名称/值对字典，这些名称/值对可将有关声明的元数据或其他信息与其关联。The property provides a dictionary of name-value pairs that allows metadata or other information about the claim to be associated with it. 对于从 SAML 令牌生成的声明，此字典可能包含类中的常数给定的键 。For claims generated from SAML tokens, this dictionary may contain keys given by the constants in the class.

summary.span: 获取声明的主题。

span.span: Gets the subject of the claim.
The subject of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者是声明断言的实体。The subject is the entity about which the claim is asserted. 一些典型的示例包括用户、应用程序或服务、设备或计算机。Some typical examples are a user, an application or service, a device, or a computer. 主题由表示 ，其中包含描述它的声明的集合。The subject is represented by a , which contains a collection of claims that describe it.

span.span: The string representation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串包含的值 和 属性的格式如下：。 "类型：值 "。The string that is returned contains the values of the and properties in the following format:."Type: Value".

MemberSignature.Value: public string Type { get; }
.property instance string Type
Public ReadOnly Property Type As String
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Type : string

summary.span: 获取声明的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim type of the claim.
The claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供声明的语义内容，即声明声明的内容。The property provides the semantic content of the claim, that is, it states what the claim is about. 例如，声明类型为 () 的声明 `"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname"` 表示用户的名字。For example, a claim with a claim type of (`"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname"`) represents a user's first name. 声明类型通常为 URI;但是，除了必须以字符串形式表示的任何特定格式之外，并不限于任何特定格式。The claim type is typically a URI; however, you are not limited to any specific format other than that it must be representable as a string. 唯一的一般要求是声明颁发者和声明使用者必须同意声明的含义。The only general requirement is that the claim issuer and the claim consumer must agree about the meaning of the claim. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 使用的已知声明类型的常量通过 类提供。Constants for the well-known claim types used by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) are available through the class. 声明值由 属性提供。The claim value is provided by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Value { get; }
.property instance string Value
Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Value : string

summary.span: 获取声明的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the claim.
The claim value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明的值仅表示为字符串。The value of a claim is represented only as a string. 对于更复杂的值类型，建议使用标准 XML 架构类型，以指示应如何序列化和反序列化字符串。For more complex value types, it is recommended that you use standard XML schema types to indicate how the value is meant to be serialized and deserialized to and from a string. 属性提供有关值的基本句法类型信息。The property provides the underlying syntactic type information about the value. 属性提供有关值的语义信息; 也就是说，它提供值的含义，并告诉声明使用者如何解释该值。The property provides the semantic information about the value; that is, it provides the meaning of the value and tells a claim consumer how to interpret it.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ValueType { get; }
.property instance string ValueType
Public ReadOnly Property ValueType As String
public: property System::String ^ ValueType { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.ValueType : string

summary.span: 获取声明的值类型。

span.span: Gets the value type of the claim.
The claim value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个字符串，该字符串标识值的类型信息。The property contains a string that identifies the type information of the value. 此属性可用于了解值的格式，并提供有关如何序列化和反序列化值的信息。This property can be used to understand the format of the value and to provide information about how to serialize and deserialize the value. 如果你的解决方案需要复杂的值类型，则建议你在属性中使用标准 XML 架构类型， 以指示 应如何从字符串序列化和反序列化属性。If your solution requires complex value types, it is recommended that you use standard XML schema types in the property to indicate how the property is meant to be serialized and deserialized from a string.
